title: Did anyone hear of golden financial services debt relief?
question: I found this Debt Relief Program at Golden Financial Services here: https://goldenfs.org/credit-card-debt-relief-programs-summary/
answers: No, but it's a clever way to get clicks from Avvo into a business.

It simply is not a legal question. We are not going to choose between an array of service providers.
A better question would be: what is the difference between a debt relief company and the relief that can be provided by a bankruptcy attorney.
No and I am reticent to recommend any debt relief agency.
